header.content: Coverage analysis and reporting for API operations - Analyzes tested vs untested operations and provides quality gate reporting.
{bold Analysis}: Discovers operations and compares with test coverage
{bold Quality Gates}: Configurable coverage thresholds with pass/fail reporting
{bold Reporting}: Summary, detailed, and JSON format support
